author: Louise Hall, Louise Hall
title: Coronavirus: CDC begins retroactive testing to detect undiagnosed Covid-19 cases
description: Agency to carry out testing on residents who remained un-symptomatic in Covid-19 hotspots
content:
Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) has began carrying out tests to see how many people in the US have been infected with coronavirus, a spokesperson told Politico.
According to the report, the organisation will even be testing those who never d… [+2688 chars]
